title: is it allowed to make more than one league account
body:
i wasnt sure if you can have more than one league account so i decide to ask, im not gonna throw on it, cheat grind, or anything bad like that, i just wanna go through the 1-30 again just not on my main

-thank you for reading

replies.body: Absolutely! Many players have at least one smurf, even some Rioters.
Thank you so much for the help! :)
